title: Online Language Instructional Design Utilizing Mobile-Based Nested Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language education experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing elementary school teachers' competency to design and implement effective online scaffolding strategies using mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can design step-by-step language education activities using mobile learning platforms according to the nested scaffolding model.
Learners can develop multi-level (3+ criteria) assessment rubrics to systematically monitor learner progress.
Learners can explain methods for providing individualized feedback using diverse digital tools such as quizzes, virtual role-playing, and integrated tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
